title: Signs of trouble. Aspects of delinquency. Ep. 2. We hate school (TEFC)
creator_credit: Gordon Croton and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Truancy and disruptive behaviour at school are on the increase. This program looks at the causes and possible solutions. This second part of the series, Signs of Trouble, was shot in Britain and the USA, and introduced by Laurie Taylor, Professor of Sociology at the University of York.
